Description.en: Cancel the effects of all \fin{} cards this round.
Swap two played \stn{} cards between any two players other than yourself.
Your \stn{} cards cannot be changed by any future \fin{} effects this round.
If you have played a \brg{} against a \btr{}, you may take all their held \act{} and \fin{} cards.
If you have played a \btr{} against a \brg{}, you may change your stance to a \brg{}, if you are holding one. If you do so, the other player gains 2 extra points.
Gain 3 points for every time you have played a \btr{} against a \btr{} in this round.
Gain 3 points for every time you have played a \brg{} against a \btr{} in this round.
Replace one of your played \stn{} cards with one of the opposite \stn{}, if you hold one.
Choose another player. Both of you lose 5 points. If you are already the player with the lowest score before losing these points, only the other player loses 5 points.
If more than half the \fin{} cards have already been resolved, gain 3 points. Otherwise, lose 1 point.
The player of the next \fin{} to resolve loses 4 points.
Lose 3 points. You may not lose any further points this round, for any reason.
Pick up 4 played \stn{} cards, shuffle them, and randomly deal them back to where they were taken from before revealing them.
Take 3 points from one player, and give 3 points to a player other than yourself.
Choose another player. All other players vote for you, or for the other player. If you win a majority of votes, take 3 points from the other player. If you do not, give 3 points to them.
If this is the last \fin{} to resolve, gain 5 points.
Every player gains 1 point for every \brg{} they have played.
You may ignore any points lost due to any one \btr{}.
Gain 1 point for every time a player played a \btr{} against a \brg{} in this round.
Gain 3 points and discard all of your \act{} and \fin{} cards.
Ask a player you have played a \btr{} against if they forgive you. If they do, you gain 3 points, and they gain 1 point.
Select 3 pairs of \brg{}/\btr{} and swap them. You may only select 1 interaction involving yourself.
